verses.verse: So these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%> ceased <S%H7673><s%> to answer <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%>, because he was righteous <S%H6662><s%> in his own eyes <S%H5869><s%>.

Then was kindled <S%H2734><s%> the wrath <S%H639><s%> of Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%>, of the relatives <S%H4940><s%> of Ram <S%H7410><s%>: against Job <S%H347><s%> was his wrath <S%H639><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%>, because he justified <S%H6663><s%> himself <S%H5315><s%> rather than God <S%H430><s%>.

Also against his three <S%H7969><s%> friends <S%H7453><s%> was his wrath <S%H639><s%> kindled <S%H2734><s%>, because they had found <S%H4672><s%> no answer <S%H4617><s%>, and yet had condemned <S%H7561><s%> Job <S%H347><s%>.
Now Elihu <S%H453><s%> had waited <S%H2442><s%> until Job <S%H347><s%> had spoken <S%H1697><s%>, because they were elder than he <S%H2205><s%>.

When Elihu <S%H453><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that there was no answer <S%H4617><s%> in the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of these three <S%H7969><s%> men <S%H582><s%>, then his wrath <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%>.

And Elihu <S%H453><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Barachel <S%H1292><s%> the Buzite <S%H940><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> and said <S%H559><s%>, I am young <S%H6810><s%>, and you are very old <S%H3453><s%>; therefore I was afraid <S%H2119><s%>, and dared <S%H3372><s%> not show <S%H2331><s%> you my opinion <S%H1843><s%>.
I said <S%H559><s%>, Days <S%H3117><s%> should speak <S%H1696><s%>, and multitude <S%H7230><s%> of years <S%H8141><s%> should teach <S%H3045><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>.
But <S%H403><s%> there is a spirit <S%H7307><s%> in man <S%H582><s%>: and the inspiration <S%H5397><s%> of the Almighty <S%H7706><s%> gives them understanding <S%H995><s%>.
Great men <S%H7227><s%> are not always wise <S%H2449><s%>: neither do the aged <S%H2205><s%> understand <S%H995><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>.
Therefore I said <S%H559><s%>, Listen <S%H8085><s%> to me <S%H2331><s%>; I also will show my opinion <S%H1843><s%>.
Behold <S%H3176><s%>, I waited for your words <S%H1697><s%>; I gave ear <S%H238><s%> to your reasons <S%H8394><s%>, while you searched out <S%H2713><s%> what to say <S%H4405><s%>.
Yes <S%H995><s%>, I attended unto you <S%H3198><s%>, and, behold, there was none of you that convinced Job <S%H347><s%>, or that answered <S%H6030><s%> his words <S%H561><s%>:
Lest you should say <S%H559><s%>, We have found out <S%H4672><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%>: God <S%H410><s%> thrusts him down <S%H5086><s%>, not man <S%H376><s%>.
Now he has not directed <S%H6186><s%> his words <S%H4405><s%> against me <S%H7725><s%>: neither will I answer him with your speeches <S%H561><s%>.
They were amazed <S%H2865><s%>, they answered <S%H6030><s%> no more <S%H6275><s%>: they left off speaking <S%H4405><s%>.
When I had waited <S%H3176><s%>, (for they spoke <S%H1696><s%> not <S%H5975><s%>, but stood still, and answered no more <S%H6030><s%>;)
I said <S%H6030><s%>, I will answer also my part <S%H2506><s%>, I also will show <S%H2331><s%> my opinion <S%H1843><s%>.
For I am full <S%H4390><s%> of words <S%H4405><s%>, the spirit <S%H7307><s%> inside <S%H990><s%> me constrains me <S%H6693><s%>.
Behold <S%H990><s%>, my belly is as wine <S%H3196><s%> which has no vent <S%H6605><s%>; it is ready to burst <S%H1234><s%> like new <S%H2319><s%> bottles <S%H178><s%>.
I will speak <S%H1696><s%>, that I may be refreshed <S%H7304><s%>: I will open <S%H6605><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%> and answer <S%H6030><s%>.
Let me not <S%H5375><s%>, I pray you, accept any man <S%H376><s%>'s person <S%H6440><s%>, neither let me give flattering titles <S%H3655><s%> unto man <S%H120><s%>.
For I know <S%H3045><s%> not to give flattering titles <S%H3655><s%>; in so doing my maker <S%H6213><s%> would soon <S%H4592><s%> take me away <S%H5375><s%>.
